glsa.title: msmtp: X.509 NULL spoofing vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: An error in the hostname matching in msmtp might enable remote attackers to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks.

background.p: msmtp is an SMTP client and SMTP plugin for mail user agents such as Mutt.

description.p: A vulnerability have been discovered in msmtp. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker might employ a specially crafted certificate to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks on SSL connections made using msmtp.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All msmtp users should upgrade to the latest version:
